# `S3toS4spatGridObj`

Spatially Binned Data


## Description

convert S3 spatialGridObj to S4


## Usage

```r
S3toS4spatialGridObj(object)
```


## Arguments

Argument      |Description
------------- |----------------
`object`     |     S3 spatialGridObj
